originalText.text: Have been going here for 8 years and never had issues with using my stamp card except today when the lady told me I couldn’t use it at this location. Well I’m done with perfect brows for good now. Don’t advertise things for no reason. You definitely lost a long time customer.

text.text: Have been going here for 8 years and never had issues with using my stamp card except today when the lady told me I couldn’t use it at this location. Well I’m done with perfect brows for good now. Don’t advertise things for no reason. You definitely lost a long time customer.

originalText.text: I went to this location to receive my monthly wax usually when I go there is another woman there Hispanic that gives great service. Today when I went I was met by this women who had one customer and her chair and another one sitting to wait for a wax. Since covid regulations does not allow people to wait: I asked her how long would it take to complete the services for both customers so I can return. I was lead to believe it will take 20-40 minutes and she would call me when she was almost done. I let her know I would be sitting in my car that was parked a block away once she call me I can just walk in. Unfortunately due to her bad customer service she never called me when I walked over to see why I was not called yet there was another young lady waiting so I assume because she did not start with her and she had me waiting in my car for a phone call that when I came in she would render the services I asked for. Instead she asked me to wait another 30 minutes then began to lie about how this young lady was there before me when I asked where she said she was waiting in the wax room but the same individual that was waiting when I first came just left out of there so when I asked her did u just get a wax she said yes I am done. So next in line was me so she began saying I can come the next day instead If I can’t wait again which I found very rude since I was there waiting already. When I let her know I will not be receiving any services from that location and that I need her name to report her actions to the manager she said she’s not telling me her name and if I am adamant about being see today I can go to another location so I took a picture of her and left. Then she called me and said I can go to the 86th street location between 2nd & 3rd Ave that she was going to call them and tell them I am on my way which I believe she never did. Out of all the people I dealt with when coming here she was the worst tech I ever meant and so rude.

originalText.text: If I could give 10 stars, I would! **********! I went in today for a Brazilian Sugaring service and it was amazing. Let me start by saying that I am 6 and a half months pregnant. This is my first such service during my pregnancy. I had gotten regular Brazilian waxes at various other salons in the past and remember it always being an excruciating experience, so I was very nervous about the pain I knew was coming since being pregnant makes your skin that much more sensitive, especially down there. But the technician was so gentle and careful! Of course it wasn't completely pain-free, but so much better than the horrible pain I remember feeling with waxing! It was totally doable. I would highly recommend this spot for Brazilian hair removal. The salon itself is quaint, clean and professional-looking. There was no wait at all; when I arrived I was shown straight into the waxing room. I was in and out, which is great because I came during my lunch break from work and was able to make it back to work without having been out too long. That being said, the technician was still very attentive and did not rush through the appointment. Also, as this is important to some people, there were no awkward moments. We chatted throughout, but even during the minute or two when it was quiet it was totally fine. I will certainly be returning for a monthly Brazilian service up until my delivery and after as well. High, highly recommend! Excellent service!

originalText.text: This place was great. the services was good -lady was nice .Its perrty big for a waxing place

text.text: This place was great. the services was good -lady was nice .Its perrty big for a waxing place

originalText.text: I wanted to try out sugar waxing because I heard it is less painful (I typically go to European waxing ) so I asked the waxer , what type of wax does she recommend ? She told me chocolate wax. So I tried it out and it was the worst pain ever! I literally felt like she was ripping my skin off!!  And the worst part about it she could not grab all of the hair, so it took longer . So when she was done, It looked like something I had done myself! A lot of patches of hair left . Waste of money! And also not to mention she cut me with the wax paper several times , so I was bleeding after the session. I have been waxing for over 10 years and never had bleeding after my session . So now I have to go back to European wax to have them fix the patches of hair that she left! I will never come here again! They don’t even deserve 1 star. I think this place is only good for brow threading  but that’s it! Go to a REAL waxer for REAL results!
